translations.chinese: 周勃定代，斬陳豨於當城。
translations.english: Zhou Bo pacified Dai and beheaded Chen Xi at Dangcheng.

translations.chinese: 詔曰：「吳，古之建國也，日者荊王兼有其地，今死亡後。
translations.english: The edict said: "Wu is an ancient established state. Previously King Jing combined and had its territory. Now after his death.

translations.chinese: 朕欲復立吳王，其議可者。」
translations.english: I wish to re-establish the King of Wu. Discuss who is suitable."

translations.chinese: 長沙王臣等言：「沛侯濞重厚，請立為吳王。」
translations.english: King Changsha and others said: "Marquis of Pei Liu Bi is substantial and sincere. Please establish him as King of Wu."

translations.chinese: 已拜，上召謂濞曰：「汝狀有反相。」
translations.english: Already enfeoffed, the emperor summoned and said to Liu Bi: "Your appearance has the look of rebellion."
